Oliver Musila Litondo (a mụrụ n'afọ 1948) bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nta akụkọ na onye na-agụ akụkọ.  A maara ya maka igosi Kimani Maruge na ihe nkiri akụkọ ndụ nke afọ 2010 The First Grader  Maka ihe ngosi ya dịka Maruge, Litondo meriri AARP Movies for Grownups Award for Best Actor na Black Film Critics Circle Award for Best Actor.  A họpụtakwara ya maka NAACP Image Award for Outstanding Actor in a Motion Picture maka arụmọrụ ya na The First Grader
Litondo bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Iowa, Mahadum Stockholm na Mahadum Harvard  Ọ lụrụ Beldina.  Litondo bụ onye natara Kalasha Lifetime Achievement award.
